data.name: SUL 3D - Farroupilla
data.detailed_description:
Farroupilla takes place many years before SOUTH 3D, more specifically during the Farroupilha Revolution; historical conflict that marked the attempt of Rio Grande do Sul to separate from the Brazilian Empire and form an independent republic. During the game you will have to face the imperial soldiers, all dressed in the uniforms of the time, as well as infiltrate military bases to obtain information that will help you to free the black spearmen who were captured by the imperial army.
This DLC is only available in Portuguese
data.about_the_game:
Farroupilla takes place many years before SOUTH 3D, more specifically during the Farroupilha Revolution; historical conflict that marked the attempt of Rio Grande do Sul to separate from the Brazilian Empire and form an independent republic. During the game you will have to face the imperial soldiers, all dressed in the uniforms of the time, as well as infiltrate military bases to obtain information that will help you to free the black spearmen who were captured by the imperial army.
This DLC is only available in Portuguese
data.short_description: A western shooter set in Rio Grande do Sul at the time of the Farroupilha revolution! With three phases, the game features missions in which the player must face soldiers of the imperial army, gather information and free the black spearmen captured by the enemy army.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® XP 32/64 or better
  • Processor: Dual core 2.4 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB de RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB DX9 Compliant
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 803 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Attention: Windows 8 may cause problems
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 7 32/64 or better
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3
  • Memory: 4 GB de RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB DX9 Compliant
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 803 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Attention: Windows 8 may cause problems
